Andreas Pereira (Manchester United): “Barça know we’re a big club. We have great players, a great team, so they have to respect us as well and I think they will, like we do for them.”

Respect! Respect! Respect!

Lenglet: "From 2nd division to Barça? It's very rare for a player to move from 2nd division to Sevilla then at Barcelona in a span of 3 years, it's a result of hard work and effort I put in training daily."

"Frankly speaking, I didn't expect to play much this season but I was lucky and managed to play 35/36 matches. As my first season at Barça I can't dream anything more."

"My first goal was to give confidence to my colleagues in me, because I was playing at an important position where I had to do everything perfectly, we play in a team where possession of the ball a sacred thing."

"Puyol said that Pique is the best defender in the world? I agree with him 100%. Especially due to his performance since the beginning of the season and he is an inspiration to us because he spent his entire life in Catalunya and knows the club very well."

Ivan Rakitic will not leave Barça this summer. The club wants to renew and improve his contract. Both Barça and coach Ernesto Valverde are very happy with him [cope]
